ValidationRule.description: Block Ready to Submit until key business & contact fields are present.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISPICKVAL(Status__c, "Ready to Submit"), OR( ISBLANK(Business_Name__c), ISBLANK(Actual_Monthly_Volume__c), ISBLANK(Primary_Contact_Name__c), ISBLANK(Primary_Contact_Phone__c), ISBLANK(Primary_Contact_Email__c) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please complete Business Name, Monthly Volume, and Primary Contact (name/phone/email) before marking Ready to Submit.
